item.title: about
item.description: Hello, my name is Sam. I am a software developer and I work in the Health Tech industry with Aire Logic. I also have previous experience in the energy and linguistics industries. I work predominently with the NHS, including NHS Digital and the Leeds Teaching Hospitals Trust. I mostly dabble with .NET and React, and have helped develop some pretty cool applications for some pretty cool companies, such as forms4health and LTHT’s Electronic Health Record system, PPM+.

item.title: contact
item.description: You can contact me via the below mediums. Email: me@{this website} Twitter: @samn_dev GitHub: nogalskisam LinkedIn: @nogalskisam
